remarks: Partial reverse closure for any structure defined as a two-argument function.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 2-Dec-2019.)
statement:
strov2rcl.s $e |- S = ( I F R ) $.
strov2rcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
strov2rcl.f $e |- Rel dom F $.
strov2rcl $p |- ( X e. B -> I e. _V ) $.
